取.definition: to take; to get; to choose; to fetch

取之不盡，用之不竭.pinyin: qǔ zhī bù jǐn ， yòng zhī bù jié

取代.definition: to replace; to supersede; to supplant; (chemistry) substitution

取保候審.definition: release from custody, subject to provision of a surety, pending investigation (PRC)

取其精華.definition: to take the best; to absorb the essence

取其精華，去其糟粕.pinyin: qǔ qí jīng huá ， qù qí zāo pò
取其精華，去其糟粕.definition: take the cream, discard the dross (political and educational slogan); keep what is good, discard the rest; You need to be selective when studying.; In modernizing the country, don't accept uncritically all foreign ideas.

取出.definition: to take out; to extract; to draw out

取勝.definition: to score a victory; to prevail over one's opponents

取名.definition: to name; to be named; to christen; to seek fame

取巧.definition: quick fix; opportune short cut (around a difficulty); cheap trick (to get what one wants); to pull a fast one

取得.definition: to acquire; to get; to obtain

取得勝利.definition: to prevail; to achieve victory; to be victorious

取捨.definition: to select; to make one's choice; to decide what to accept and what to reject

取景.definition: to select a scene (for filming, sketching etc)

取景框.definition: rectangular frame used to view a scene (made out of cardboard etc, or formed by the thumbs and forefingers); viewfinder; viewing frame

取暖.definition: to warm oneself (by a fire etc)

取樂.definition: to find amusement; to amuse oneself

取款.definition: to withdraw money from a bank

取水.definition: water intake; to obtain water (from a well etc)

取決.definition: (usually followed by 於|于[yu2]) to hinge on; to be decided by; to depend on

取決於.definition: to hinge on; to be decided by; to depend on

取消禁令.definition: to lift a prohibition; to lift a ban

取用.definition: to access; to make use of

取笑.definition: to tease; to make fun of

取經.definition: to journey to India on a quest for the Buddhist scriptures; to learn by studying another's experience

取締.definition: to suppress; to crack down on; to prohibit

取而代之.definition: (idiom) to replace; to supersede; to take its (or her etc) place

取道.definition: via; by way of; en route to

取銀.definition: to take silver; to come second in a competition

取長補短.definition: lit. use others' strengths to make up for one's weak points (idiom from Mencius); to use this in place of that; what you lose on the swings, you win on the roundabouts

取關.definition: to unfollow (on social media etc) (abbr. for 取消關注|取消关注[qu3xiao1 guan1zhu4])

取鬧.definition: to make trouble; to make fun of
